name: Aviation Training Center of Tunisia (ATCT)
about: The Aviation Training Center of Tunisia (ATCT) is a pioneering institution in the aviation training industry, founded by the national Tunisian airlines Tunisair, Nouvelair Tunisie, and Karthago Airlines. Located in the seaside resort of Gammarth, Tunis, ATCT is renowned for its world-class facilities and cutting-edge technology, including advanced flight simulators such as the Airbus A320 Full Flight Simulator. Our highly qualified instructors, with over 18,000 hours of flight experience, provide top-tier training in various courses, including JAA Certified Airbus A320 Type Rating, Entry Level Training, and Low Visibility Procedures. ATCT is committed to delivering precision and excellence in aviation training, setting the standard for the Mediterranean region. With a focus on innovative and effective training methods, ATCT continues to elevate the art of flying.
services:
["A320 TYPE RATING COURSE
ELT JET FAMILIARIZATION COURSE
ELT JET FAMILIARIZATION + MULTI CREW COOPERATION COURSE
CROSS CREW QUALIFICATION COURSE
REFRESHER COURSE
SPECIFIC COURSES"]
